item.title: The first router is introduced by Synology
item.description:
Source: Synology. The Synology Router RT1900ac. Synology has introduced its first router, the Synology Router RT1900ac. This router allows users to connect an external storage device, effectively creating a personal cloud storage solution. The router boasts combined transfer speeds of up to 1,900 Mbps and utilizes beamforming technology to optimize Wi-Fi signals for individual devices. A mobile app provides users with control over the router’s functions...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-first-router-is-introduced-by-synology/
